Text:
INSTRUCTIONS: Extract the Assets, Content, Manuals folders to your railworks folder then delete blueprints.

WARNING: you must have a PhD in Quantum Physics to copy/paste folders! ;)

It does but use the keys E for the master key then W to move reverser.

Use the E key to insert the master key then W to move the reverser.

The problem I have is once the brake has been applied it sounds like a steam engine.

The problem I have once the brake has been applied it sounds like a steam engine.
Heres what happens to me. brake 700%? Throttle 400%? Front and back cabs have red lights
Hi, would it be possible for someone to upload the updated versions of the Armstrong Powerhouse scenario packs and extra stock please? Many thanks in advance :)

Works a treat

inset drivers key
select forward
cancel aws
tail lights off
head and marker lights on
pull out drivers reminder appliance
select forward, break off, apply power.

Thanks for the awesome upload!!
Can you please upload most of the TS2012-updated add-ons?
Thanks again :)

@ ealingTC

you don't use the installer

simply move all the folders/files or merge them into the installation folder.

the class 150 will them be in the scenario list
